cmmn:ifPart.cmmn:condition:
<!CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<conditionsList>
    <conditions>
        <condition>
            <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script</type>
            <properties>
                <property>
                    <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/grant-permission/1.0">ns2:owner</type>
                    <value>admin</value>
                </property>
                <property>
                    <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script.script</type>
                    <value>(function() {
                        //if (!usoa.isSignerValid(document.nodeRef)) {
                        //throw 'Подписант потерял возможность подписывать документ';
                        //} else {
                        return true;
                        //}
                        })()</value>
                </property>
                <property>
                    <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/grant-permission/1.0">ns2:inherits</type>
                    <value>true</value>
                </property>
            </properties>
        </condition>
    </conditions>
</conditionsList>
]]>

<!CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <conditionsList> <conditions> <condition> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script</type> <properties> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script.script</type> <value><import resource="classpath:alfresco/module/contracts-repo/script/contract-cm-handlers.js"> isDigiSigning() == true && doNotSendContractToEdiFlag() == true</value> </property> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/attribute/1.0">ns2:isDocument</type> <value>false</value> </property> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/attribute/1.0">ns2:isContainer</type> <value>false</value> </property> </properties> </condition> </conditions> </conditionsList> ]]>

<!CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <conditionsList> <conditions> <condition> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script</type> <properties> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/grant-permission/1.0">ns2:owner</type> <value>admin</value> </property> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script.script</type> <value>(document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveActivities'] === undefined || document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveActivities'] === null || (document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveActivities'] !== null && document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveActivities'].length == 0)) && (document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveStatus'] === null || (document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveStatus'] !== null && document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveStatus'].length == 0))</value> </property> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/grant-permission/1.0">ns2:inherits</type> <value>true</value> </property> </properties> </condition> </conditions> </conditionsList> ]]>

<!CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <conditionsList> <conditions> <condition> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script</type> <properties> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/grant-permission/1.0">ns2:owner</type> <value>admin</value> </property> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/condition/1.0">ns2:evaluate-script.script</type> <value>((document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveActivities'] !== undefined || document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveActivities'] !== null || ( document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveStatus'] !== null && document.assocs['contracts:lastActiveStatus'].length > 0)) && (event.parent.properties['lc:state'] == "Started"))</value> </property> <property> <type xmlns:ns2="http://www.citeck.ru/model/grant-permission/1.0">ns2:inherits</type> <value>true</value> </property> </properties> </condition> </conditions> </conditionsList> ]]>
